fightsoul.name: TIGER
fightsoul.description: When our ally or enemy team dies, they will rage. When attacking will restore Rage.

fightsoul.name: SNAKE
fightsoul.description: When attacking, restores some Rage. When allies or enemy factions die, they will rage.
